exam_papers.title: 2023年3月大学英语四级考试真题（二）
exam_papers.description: 2023年3月大学英语四级考试真题（第二套），包含写作、听力、阅读理解和翻译四个部分

exam_papers.title: 2023年3月大学英语四级考试真题（三）
exam_papers.description: 2023年3月大学英语四级考试真题（第三套），包含写作、听力、阅读理解和翻译四个部分

exam_sections.directions: Suppose you have read a book recently and intend to recommend it to other members of your book club via an online forum. Briefly introduce the book and explain why it is worth reading. You will have 30 minutes for this task and should write at least 120 words but no more than 180 words.
说明:由于2023年3月四级考试全国只考了一套听力,本套真题听力与第一套内容完全一样,只是顺序不一样,因此在本套真题中不再重复出现。
说明:由于2023年3月四级考试阅读理解部分全国只考了一套试题,本套真题阅读与第一套内容完全一样,只是顺序不一样,因此在本套真题中不再重复出现。
For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to translate a passage from Chinese into English. You should write your answer on Answer Sheet 2.
exam_sections.translation_content: 近年来,越来越多的城市居民为农村的田园风光所吸引,利用节假日到乡村旅游,他们住在农民家中,品尝具有当地风味的农家饭菜,有些游客还参与采摘瓜果等活动,亲身感受收获的喜悦。乡村旅游能够有效地帮助游客舒缓压力,放松心情,增进身心健康。实际上,这种旅游形式不仅能使城市游客受益,同时也能增加农民的收入,促进农村经济发展。
exam_sections.translation_requirements: 请将以下中文段落准确翻译成英文，注意语法正确和表达流畅

exam_sections.directions: Suppose you have attended a lecture delivered by a famous scholar. Write a report to the campus newspaper, summarizing its most important points. You will have 30 minutes for this task and should write at least 120 words but no more than 180 words.
说明:由于2023年3月四级考试全国只考了一套听力，本套真题听力与第一套内容完全一样，只是顺序不一样，因此在本套真题中不再重复出现。
说明:由于2023年3月四级考试阅读理解部分全国只考了一套试题，本套真题阅读与第一套内容完全一样，只是顺序不一样，因此在本套真题中不再重复出现。
For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to translate a passage from Chinese into English. You should write your answer on Answer Sheet 2.
exam_sections.translation_content: 近年来，越来越多的年轻人喜爱各种形式的自助旅游。许多自助旅游者选择徒步或者骑自行车出游。他们自己设计路线、自带帐篷、厨具以及其他必备的生活用品。在旅途中，自助旅游者能够发现一些新的美丽景点，但有时也会遇见意想不到的困难或突发事件。游客在旅行中拥抱自然、欣赏美景，同时也增强了自己克服困难的勇气和野外生存的能力。
exam_sections.translation_requirements: 请将以下中文段落准确翻译成英文，注意语法正确和表达流畅

exam_questions.question_text: Suppose you have read a book recently and intend to recommend it to other members of your book club via an online forum. Briefly introduce the book and explain why it is worth reading.
exam_questions.analysis: 写作题目，需要学生通过在线论坛向读书俱乐部成员推荐一本最近读过的书，简要介绍该书并说明推荐理由
exam_questions.explanation: 考查学生的应用文写作能力，包括书籍介绍、推荐理由阐述和语言表达能力

exam_questions.question_text: Translate the Chinese passage into English.
exam_questions.correct_answer: In recent years, an increasing number of urban residents have been attracted by the rural idyllic scene and have taken advantage of their holidays to travel to the countryside. They live in the farmers' houses and taste cuisine with local flavor. Some tourists also participate in activities such as fruit picking, experiencing the joy of harvest at first hand. Village tourism can efficiently help tourists relieve stress, get relaxed and improve physical and mental health. In fact, this form of tourism can not only benefit urban tourists, but also increase farmers' income and boost the development of the rural economy.
exam_questions.analysis: 翻译题目，需要学生将关于乡村旅游的中文段落准确翻译成英文
exam_questions.explanation: 考查学生的汉译英能力，包括词汇选择、语法结构、句式转换和语言表达的准确性

exam_questions.question_text: Suppose you have attended a lecture delivered by a famous scholar. Write a report to the campus newspaper, summarizing its most important points.
exam_questions.analysis: 写作题目，需要学生给校报写一篇关于著名学者讲座的报道，总结讲座要点
exam_questions.explanation: 考查学生的报道写作能力，包括讲座内容概括、要点总结和语言表达能力

exam_questions.question_text: Translate the Chinese passage into English.
exam_questions.correct_answer: In recent years, an increasing number of young people have been keen on various forms of self-guided tours. Many self-guided tourists choose to go on a trip on foot or by bike. They plan out routes and bring tents, kitchenware and other daily necessities by themselves. During the journey, self-guided tourists can often discover a few new beautiful scenic spots, but sometimes encounter unexpected difficulties or emergencies as well. Tourists embrace nature and enjoy wonderful views during their trips, and at the same time they build up their courage to overcome difficulties and their ability to survive in the wild.
exam_questions.analysis: 翻译题目，需要学生将关于自助旅游的中文段落准确翻译成英文
exam_questions.explanation: 考查学生的汉译英能力，包括词汇选择、语法结构、句式转换和语言表达的准确性
